inscription.text: 17. Super Deluxe Cardboard 18. Thums Up 19. Safety Matches. Marketed by: The Continental Match Company 20. Roller Safety Matches 21. (Back of number 20). Roller. Meena Match Industries (B) Unit. Sankaralingapuram. 22. Special 502 Damp Proff. 23. Safety Matches Deluxe 24. Super 501 Safety Matches. 25. Swan 26. New Lucky 502 Safety Matches 27. Back of number twenty-seven. 28. Makan (Hindi text) Super Deluxe Matches 29. Back of twenty eight. 30. Kathiravan Match Works. Sanankulam. 31. Moscot 32. Meerakumanr Match Works. Chindapalli. 33. Packyalakshmi Match Works. Manthithoppu 34.Master Pan Safety Match.35. VKT. Alagar Match Works. Mettugundu. 36. Sarathi Safety Matches. @artist=Collector : Abhishek Khandelwal
